titles.title: When We All Get Together In The Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
When we all get together in the Lord,
When we all get together in the Lord,
We will treat one another like sister and brother
When we all get together in the Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
When the family gets together in the Lord,
When the family gets together in the Lord,
We will love one another like sister and brother
When the family gets together in the Lord.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
When the tall and the small get together in the Lord
Get together in the Lord
We will soon realize that we're all the same size
When we all get together in the Lord.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
When we all submit together, flow together in the Lord
And submit together in the Lord
In the life of God we'll flow
And each member shall surely know
We're the many-membered Body of the Lord.
